name: Old Pals
_source: speak;Sages;Hah! Smoke, Landros, Aerial! How's it going?
speak;Smoke;Hey! Your Highness, give us some SAGE advice!
speak;Sages;Uh, well...{c:wait;400} Something I learned recently was...|ALWAYS CHECK THE RULES OF THE CARD GAME YOU'RE PLAYING!
speak;Landros;Don't tell me you lost a lot of money.
speak;Sages;Uhm, alright! I won't!|My mouth? Shut!
speak;Aerial;It's okay your Highness, I'm sure I can win it back.
speak;Smoke;His skills will DEAL some serious damage to anyone's wallets!
speak;Landros;That was a stretch and you know it.
speak;Aerial;C'mon guys. A little less bickering in front of the prince.
speak;Aerial;You could stay with us, come back home?
speak;Smoke;Hello? We're looking for an Anne, Sir.
speak;Landros;I think his silence is the answer, but why?

speak;Sages;Travelling far and wide, meeting new people...|Seeing what the world has to offer...|If I go home, I'm sure I'll have to do boring strategy stuff with father.|I just don't want to end up stuck in the castle, watching him... get worse...
speak;Aerial;Well, given things might be getting lively soon...|You might be needed to travel some more on his behalf.|Also, you would'a been sent to Aurelia... had you been home.
speak;Smoke;Good, also you can lean on us, your Highness.|If you need to...
